Detailed Description

This class is the base class for python objects that wrap (or can otherwise provide) a fashion.

PyFashion * PyFashion::makeCopy ( PyModel *  pModel,
const char *  attrName 
) [virtual]

This method makes a copy of the fashion for the given model, and returns a new reference to the copy.

If no copy is necessary, then another reference to the same fashion may be returned. If NULL is returned, an exception must be set. This method can also be used as an 'attach' method for fashions which prefer to implement attach/detach semantics.

Note:
Do not store a reference to the PyModel, as it would be circular.

Reimplemented in PyDye, and Tracker.
